name: Cake's Revenge
description:
The cake is mad about being eaten! Its had enough! Its trying to stop you from letting the party happen. You can't have a party without cake! We've gotta get the next best thing! Cupcakes!

This game was created for the WeeklyGameJam week 108: Where's The Cake?

I decided to take this in a different direction and make it a horror/stealth game.

This game was made in a week, so it may have some  bugs/issues. Feel free to tell me about them in the comments.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

  • WASD to move. Space to jump.
  • Shift to run.
  • E to see the cake through walls.
  • Collect 8 cupcakes to complete the game. Avoid the giant evil cake.
